summary:
High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for the dragonborn nordic carved set
(dragonborn needed)
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=red]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]


[size=5] HD Retexture for the nordic carved set [/size]
(surprise .... you will need Dragonborn DLC to see this in game)

  °°°  resolution 2k cuirass, 1k gloves helmet boots  ,2k shield (now included)
 
  °°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.
  
  °°°  This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, including remodeled mesh versions 
(for various body replacers) and mods using parts of the set.
   
  °°°  [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: use Nexus Mod Manager or Wrye Bash and chose which version (black brown or white fur) install OR open the package with 7zip or winrar browse inside black fur , brown fur or white fur folder,copy \"textures\" and paste inside skyrim \"data\" folder click yes if asked to override

[center] [youtube]4qQPU9cUhxY[/youtube] [youtube]0SLHeKsMfbk[/youtube] [youtube]b9DctlbUY2s[/youtube] [youtube]-MJvfLFwIZQ[/youtube] [/center]
